extracted_information: Aztec is a privacy-first Layer 2 solution on Ethereum. The website provides extensive developer resources including updated documentation, SDKs, development environments, and a privacy-first programming language. Key tools for building and integration include Aztec Sandbox, Aztec.js, and Aztec.nr. While detailed API structures and explicit 'lightest implementation approaches' are not directly in the scraped content, the provided documentation links are where such information would reside.

features.name: Aztec Sandbox
features.description: Easily build and test private smart contracts on your machine.

features.name: Aztec.js
features.description: Manages accounts and interacts with contracts using APIs. Relevant for API structure and integration.
features.integration_notes: Enables interaction with contracts via APIs for account management.

features.name: Aztec.nr
features.description: Used for writing smart contracts. Built using Noir, Aztec's privacy-first language.
features.integration_notes: Provides a framework for smart contract development on Aztec.

features.name: Private State
features.description: Leverages confidential transactions while maintaining public verifiability.

features.name: Private Functions
features.description: Integrates privacy into applications for enhanced security without compromising functionality.

features.name: Trustlessness / Programmable Privacy
features.description: Offers programmable privacy for financial, identity, gaming, and other applications.
